tase.name: Shock therapy
tase.des: Tase the streamer for a few seconds

cloak.name: Kick in the head
cloak.des: Send an invisible cloaker after the streamer

flash.name: Spawn flashbangs
flash.des: Spawn a bunch of flashbangs all around players in loud / Blind the streamer in stealth

drunk.name: Buy a drink
drunk.des: Get the streamer slightly drunk, the effect stacks so coordinate with your fellow viewers

drills.name: Jamm drills
drills.des: Break all the active drills on the map. All of them

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.des: Send the streamer back in time by 8 seconds

package.name: Action Package
package.des: Trigger a random overpowered ultimate ability. Things can get wild
